subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: It is generally a good thing to be a starting pitcher for the Yankees, as is now the case for Sidney Ponson. But it is not so good to be with your third team in less than a year with your career and your behavior being evaluated game by game.
snippet: It is generally a good thing to be a starting pitcher for the Yankees, as is now the case for Sidney Ponson. But it is not so good to be with your third team in less than a year with your career and your behavior being evaluated game by game.
